import React from"react";import'./clothes.css';import listClothers from'./data/listClothers.json';function ClothesRecomendate(props){var weather=props.weather;var tempClothers=function tempClothers(t){if(typeof t!="undefined"){//проверяем существует ли температура
if(t.temp&&t.temp>=25){return"".concat(listClothers.map(function(item){return item.hot;}));}if(t.temp&&t.temp>=20){return"".concat(listClothers.map(function(item){return item.warm;}));}if(t.temp&&t.temp>=15){return"".concat(listClothers.map(function(item){return item.warm15;}));}if(t.temp&&t.temp>=0){return"".concat(listClothers.map(function(item){return item.zero;}));}if(t.temp&&t.temp<=-1){return"".concat(listClothers.map(function(item){return item.warm1;}));}if(t.temp&&t.temp<=-20){return"".concat(listClothers.map(function(item){return item.cold;}));}}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"clothers-box"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"text"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,tempClothers(weather.main))));}export default ClothesRecomendate;
